Here's the result of running `cat -n` on /workspace/aws-cloudformation__cfn-lint__7a71d0972bdb034eaeb9f0eb85418b04e6009224/src/cfnlint/rules/resources/Configuration.py:
     1	"""
     2	Copyright Amazon.com, Inc. or its affiliates. All Rights Reserved.
     3	SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT-0
     4	"""
     5	
     6	from typing import Any
     7	
     8	import cfnlint.data.schemas.other.resources
     9	import cfnlint.helpers
    10	from cfnlint.jsonschema import ValidationResult, Validator
    11	from cfnlint.jsonschema._keywords import patternProperties
    12	from cfnlint.rules.jsonschema.CfnLintJsonSchema import CfnLintJsonSchema, SchemaDetails
    13	
    14	
    15	class Configuration(CfnLintJsonSchema):
    16	    """Check Base Resource Configuration"""
    17	
    18	    id = "E3001"
    19	    shortdesc = "Basic CloudFormation Resource Check"
    20	    description = (
    21	        "Making sure the basic CloudFormation resources are properly configured"
    22	    )
    23	    source_url = "https://github.com/aws-cloudformation/cfn-lint"
    24	    tags = ["resources"]
    25	
    26	    def __init__(self):
    27	        super().__init__(
    28	            keywords=["Resources"],
    29	            schema_details=SchemaDetails(
    30	                cfnlint.data.schemas.other.resources, "configuration.json"
    31	            ),
    32	            all_matches=True,
    33	        )
    34	        self.validators = {
    35	            "maxProperties": None,
    36	            "propertyNames": None,
    37	            "patternProperties": self._pattern_properties,
    38	        }
    39	        self.rule_set = {
    40	            "maxProperties": "E3010",
    41	            "propertyNames": "E3011",
    42	        }
    43	        self.child_rules = dict.fromkeys(list(self.rule_set.values()))
    44	
    45	    def _pattern_properties(
    46	        self, validator: Validator, aP: Any, instance: Any, schema: Any
    47	    ):
    48	        # We have to rework pattern properties
    49	        # to re-add the keyword or we will have an
    50	        # infinite loop
    51	        validator = validator.evolve(
    52	            function_filter=validator.function_filter.evolve(
    53	                add_cfn_lint_keyword=True,
    54	            )
    55	        )
    56	
    57	        yield from patternProperties(validator, aP, instance, schema)
    58	
    59	    def validate(
    60	        self, validator: Validator, keywords: Any, instance: Any, schema: Any
    61	    ) -> ValidationResult:
    62	
    63	        cfn_validator = self.extend_validator(
    64	            validator=validator,
    65	            schema=self._schema,
    66	            context=validator.context.evolve(),
    67	        )
    68	
    69	        yield from self._iter_errors(cfn_validator, instance)
    70
